sys_variable_value.value: {"name":"root","children":[{"name":"id","children":[],"type":"string","jpath":"$.id","previewValue":"cmpl-79rtNpG0JhjvNLys5ZV7hdYJ3Lybr"},{"name":"object","children":[],"type":"string","jpath":"$.object","previewValue":"text_completion"},{"name":"created","children":[],"type":"string","jpath":"$.created","previewValue":"1682586469"},{"name":"model","children":[],"type":"string","jpath":"$.model","previewValue":"text-davinci-003"},{"name":"choices","children":[{"name":"choices_object","children":[{"name":"text","children":[],"type":"string","jpath":"$.choices[*].text","previewValue":"\nOn January 24th, 2023 an employee reported a problem with being unable to connect to their email from home. The webmail appeared to be down. ITIL spoke with the customer and determined they needed a new VPN token. It was noted that the VPN ID number should be recorded in the CMDB. Beth planned to deliver the new token the next day when she was in the San Diego office. On April 26th, 2023 the VPN token was generated, but the problem still wasn't fixed. The admin then verified with the IDP that the user existed and it was discovered that the problem was related to an incorrect token refresh."},{"name":"index","children":[],"type":"string","jpath":"$.choices[*].index","previewValue":"0"},{"name":"logprobs","children":[],"type":"string","jpath":"$.choices[*].logprobs","previewValue":""},{"name":"finish_reason","children":[],"type":"string","jpath":"$.choices[*].finish_reason","previewValue":"stop"}],"type":"object","jpath":"$.choices[*]","previewValue":""}],"type":"array.object","jpath":"$.choices[*]","previewValue":""},{"name":"usage","children":[{"name":"prompt_tokens","children":[],"type":"string","jpath":"$.usage.prompt_tokens","previewValue":"312"},{"name":"completion_tokens","children":[],"type":"string","jpath":"$.usage.completion_tokens","previewValue":"130"},{"name":"total_tokens","children":[],"type":"string","jpath":"$.usage.total_tokens","previewValue":"442"}],"type":"object","jpath":"$.usage","previewValue":""}],"type":"object","jpath":"$","previewValue":""}

{"id":"cmpl-79rtNpG0JhjvNLys5ZV7hdYJ3Lybr","object":"text_completion","created":1682586469,"model":"text-davinci-003","choices":[{"text":"\nOn January 24th, 2023 an employee reported a problem with being unable to connect to their email from home. The webmail appeared to be down. ITIL spoke with the customer and determined they needed a new VPN token. It was noted that the VPN ID number should be recorded in the CMDB. Beth planned to deliver the new token the next day when she was in the San Diego office. On April 26th, 2023 the VPN token was generated, but the problem still wasn't fixed. The admin then verified with the IDP that the user existed and it was discovered that the problem was related to an incorrect token refresh.","index":0,"logprobs":null,"finish_reason":"stop"}],"usage":{"prompt_tokens":312,"completion_tokens":130,"total_tokens":442}}

sys_variable_value.value: {"id":"cmpl-79rtNpG0JhjvNLys5ZV7hdYJ3Lybr","object":"text_completion","created":1682586469,"model":"text-davinci-003","choices":[{"text":"\nOn January 24th, 2023 an employee reported a problem with being unable to connect to their email from home. The webmail appeared to be down. ITIL spoke with the customer and determined they needed a new VPN token. It was noted that the VPN ID number should be recorded in the CMDB. Beth planned to deliver the new token the next day when she was in the San Diego office. On April 26th, 2023 the VPN token was generated, but the problem still wasn't fixed. The admin then verified with the IDP that the user existed and it was discovered that the problem was related to an incorrect token refresh.","index":0,"logprobs":null,"finish_reason":"stop"}],"usage":{"prompt_tokens":312,"completion_tokens":130,"total_tokens":442}}
